ConnectionStrings.avatarBlob: PUT THE CONNECTION STRING TO THE STORAGE THAT CONTAINS THE PROFILE IMAGES. I.E.: DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=ProfileImagesStorageAccountName;AccountKey=xxxxxxxxxx
PUT THE CONNECTION STRING TO THE STORAGE THAT CONTAINS THE PROFILE IMAGES. I.E.: DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=ProfileImagesStorageAccountName;AccountKey=xxxxxxxxxx

AvatarsUrl: PUT THE URL OF THE 'avatar-output' QUEUE OF THE STORAGE THAT CONTAINS THE PROFILE IMAGES https://ProfileImagesStorageAccountName.blob.core.windows.net/avatar-output/
